author: Katie Way, Casey Johnston
title: A Tiger Has Contracted COVID-19. Should We Be More Worried About Pets?
description: There are now a few cases of animals contracting coronavirus. Here's what we know about human-animal transmission right now.
content:
In case anyone needed more proof that were in an almost unprecedentedly surreal times, a tiger at the Bronx Zoo has become the first animal to contract COVID-19 in a real-world scenario and actually display symptoms.
